attributes.action: Remove or reduce the hieght of the car ramps at University of Ulster
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
University of Ulster installed new ramps at the entrances to the Uni's to combat those who attempt to skip payment and get free parking. The installation of these ramps cause major upset for a lot of paying students and staff with their cars.  Damage is done to arches, bumpers, splitters, exhausts and mudflaps. 

The objective of this petition is to either reduce the height or remove the ramps entirely.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
